markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fetchling Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2500) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 85 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You've learned obscure lessons about your fellow fetchlings. You're trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Fetchling Lore
